A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi provides a lot for the ever-expanding Star Wars universe to work with\, and fleshes our characters the new trilogy is centered around\, while also bringing in old ones in good taste. The movie does stutter due to poorly implemented jokes and uninteresting subplots\, but is usually able to make up with great shots from director Ryan Johnson\, and very intriguing additions to the lore
